[File: aptos-core/storage/accumulator/src/lib.rs] [State Sync] [Partial Sync] Can validator sync only partial frozen subtree data and produce incorrect root hashes that appear valid? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/storage/accumulator/src/lib.rs] [State Sync] [Root Hash Only Sync] Can validator sync with only root_hash without frozen subtrees, then forge proofs using fabricated subtree structure? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/storage/accumulator/src/lib.rs] [Transaction Accumulator] [Transaction Ordering] Can append() being called with transactions in wrong order cause accumulator to accept invalid transaction history? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/storage/accumulator/src/lib.rs] [Transaction Accumulator] [Duplicate Transactions] Can same transaction hash appear multiple times in accumulator if append() is called with duplicates? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/accumulator/src/lib.rs] [Transaction Accumulator] [Missing Transactions] If some transaction hashes are skipped in append(), can proofs still be generated correctly for existing transactions? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/accumulator/src/lib.rs] [Rollback] [State Revert] If accumulator state is rolled back by deleting recent frozen nodes, can this cause inconsistency with cached num_leaves? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/storage/accumulator/src/lib.rs] [Fork] [Divergent Appends] Can two validators append different leaves at same position, creating forked accumulators with different root hashes? (Critical)
